Title: Spirited Away
Description: A young girl, Chihiro, gets trapped in a mysterious world of spirits and gods. She must navigate through this strange realm to save her parents and find her way back home.

Title: My Neighbor Totoro
Description: Two young sisters, Mei and Satsuki, move to the countryside and discover friendly forest spirits, including the lovable Totoro. Together, they embark on magical adventures.

Title: Akira
Description: In a dystopian future, a biker gang member, Tetsuo, gains incredible psychic powers. His friend Kaneda must stop him from destroying Neo-Tokyo amidst political turmoil.

Title: Your Name
Description: Two strangers, Mitsuha and Taki, find themselves swapping bodies intermittently. As they try to unravel this phenomenon, they form a deep connection transcending time and space.

Title: Princess Mononoke
Description: A young warrior, Ashitaka, becomes entangled in a conflict between the spirits of the forest and the humans who consume its resources. He seeks to find balance and peace.

Title: Grave of the Fireflies
Description: Set during World War II, two siblings struggle to survive amidst the devastation of bombings and starvation. A heartbreaking tale of love, loss, and resilience.

Title: Cowboy Bebop: The Movie
Description: The bounty hunting crew of the spaceship Bebop investigates a terrorist plot in Mars' city of Alba City. Action-packed sequences ensue as they unravel the conspiracy.

Title: Ghost in the Shell
Description: In a cyberpunk future, Major Motoko Kusanagi and her team of Section 9 operatives investigate cyber crimes and delve into the nature of consciousness and identity.

Title: Neon Genesis Evangelion: The End of Evangelion
Description: A complex and surreal conclusion to the Neon Genesis Evangelion series. Humanity faces its ultimate fate as the boundaries between reality and perception blur.

Title: Howl's Moving Castle
Description: A young woman, Sophie, is cursed by a witch and transformed into an old woman. She seeks refuge in the moving castle of the mysterious wizard Howl.
